__e: He was... my mentor and I'm not going to turn my back on him.
I'm not doing this because I get my jollies being your mentor, and I'm not doing it so years from now I can say,
I mentored him, and he turns around, this little bitch, and he doesn't have the cojones to look me in the eye and tell me the truth?
Did you ask me to be Morgan's handler because... you were trying to handle me?
How is it that a simple man who runs a way station could possibly mentor someone such as yourself?
This guy is no good for you and I order you, as your mentor, to dump him.
From the accounts I'm hearing, it sounds like you two had a student-mentor relationship... that kind of give-and-take thing.
I know this guy was kind of a mentor to you.
So I called my agent, and apparently there's this mentorship program for underprivileged kids, and a little girl actually requested me.
